text:
"Black Widow" is an upcoming 2021 American thriller dark superhero movie directed by Cate Shortland. The movie stars Scarlett Johansson, David Harbour, Florence Pugh, O-T Fagbenle, Robert Downey Jr., William Hurt, Rachel Weisz. It is the twenty-fourth movie in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
Plot.
In the alternate timeline, in an alternate 2023, Natasha Romanoff finds herself alone and forced to confront a dangerous cospiracy who ties with her past, pursued by a criminal named Taskmaster who will not stop anything to bring her down, Romanoff has to deal with her story.
